title: FPS Cap?
body:
Pretty sure a long time ago there was a way to cap your fps in game and I had mine capped at 60


Now for some reason the cap is gone and it keeps going higher than 60? Any way to redo it? I can't find a way in game and I thought there was one at some point

replies.body: A bit ago some settings reset for players, so your options may have changed back to default.  You can set your cap in-game through the video options, through the cap drop down menu.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PGQVwzbV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-12T22:37:32.254+0000)
>
> A bit ago some settings reset for players, so your options may have changed back to default.  You can set your cap in-game through the video options, through the cap drop down menu.  Hope that helps!

Yep, I found it, thanks!
